Example: When did France gift Lithuania.ELI5-Explanation-Body-Updated: France did not gift Lithuania the Vilnius TV Tower. The Vilnius TV Tower was built in Lithuania by Lithuanians between 1974 and 1980. It is the tallest structure in Lithuania and played a significant role in the events of January 1991, when Lithuania was fighting for its independence from the Soviet Union.
Example: When did France gift Lithuania.ELI5-Explanation-Body-Original: France gifted Lithuania the Vilnius TV Tower in 1980.
